subject: Fashion
title: AI-Driven Color Prediction
description: A short lesson to help you apply AI-Driven Color Prediction.

hook.text: AI can now predict next season's trending colors by analyzing millions of social posts.

buildup.text: Machine learning scans Instagram, Pinterest, and TikTok for emerging color patterns.

discovery.text: AI detects micro-shifts in color preference weeks before human forecasters notice.

twist.text: But AI can only predict what's emerging‚Äîit can't invent the next cultural mood.

climax.text: The future of color forecasting blends human intuition with algorithmic speed.

punchline.text: Machines see the data. Humans feel the moment.

quiz.question: What is a limitation of AI-driven color prediction?
options: It's too slow to be useful
It can detect trends but can't invent new cultural moods
It only works with primary colors
